content:
Hola, Tienes 2 opciones: Abrir el árbol de conversaciones y elegir el correo que necesitas ver o no usar los hilos de conversaciones (esta configuracion se cambia haciendo clic en símbolo de árbol/hilos de conversaciones de la primera columna, si esta columna no se encuentra se puede agregar haciendo clic en símbolo de la ultima columna que es el editor de columnas)

Puedes indicarnos si tiene mas consultas o puedes cerrar la consulta actual eligiendo la respuesta útil. ¡Gracias!
creator: pcp04

content:
FiltaQuilla adds a save or detach attachments action for filters (see picture).

https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/filtaquilla/

See also https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/attachment-extractor/
creator: sfhowes

content:
Try with these settings:

incoming IMAP outlook.office365.com, 993, SSL/TLS security, OAuth2 authentication, User Name = email address

outgoing SMTP smtp.office365.com, 587, STARTTLS security, OAuth2 authentication, User Name = email address

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1417298#answer-1588949

Enter the correct settings as above, remove the entries from Saved Passwords in Settings/Privacy & Security, accept cookies in Privacy & Security, restart TB, enter the account password in the OAuth window to allow TB access.
creator: sfhowes

content:
This can be done with userChrome.css (see picture): 

#today-pane-panel{   order: -1;      }


Help/Troubleshooting Info, Profile Folder, Open Folder, close TB, create a new folder named chrome, create a new document in chrome with a text editor, name it userChrome.css, Save as type: All files *.*, copy in the above code. Double-click toolkit.legacyUserProfileCustomizations.stylesheets to true in Settings/General/Config. editor, restart TB.

Online css generator

video on how to create a css file (Firefox and TB)
creator: sfhowes

content: That's working, many thanks.
creator: orwel

content:
I suggest creating a new profile, adding the accounts, and transferring the local mail and address books from the old profile to the new. Help/Troubleshooting Info, about:profiles, to create and manage profiles. Once the transfers have been completed, the old profile and its data can be removed (from about:profiles).

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1431209#answer-1618478
creator: sfhowes

content:
I wonder how in 2023 someone cannot receive html messages, but you could try adjusting the Sending Format in Settings/Composition to Both HTML and Plain text and see if that works with all recipients. Or, if you know which recipients require plain text, and your default is HTML format, hold Shift when clicking Reply or Write to switch the format to plain text.

It's also possible with an add-on like Signature Switch or Quicktext to add an html or plain text signature on a per message basis.
creator: sfhowes

content: Spustite Firefox v NÚDZOVOM režime a preverte, či problémy pretrvávajú: - [SK:] Firefox - Pomocník - Reštartovať a zakázať doplnky - [CZ:] Firefox - Nápověda - Restartovat se zakázanými doplňky
creator: Ansamb

content: Saved Passwords in Settings/Privacy & Security contains passwords and secure mail keys. I recommend removing all entries for the account in Saved Passwords, restarting TB, entering the secure mail key when asked for a password, and checking the box to store it in Saved Passwords. You might have to also enter the key the first time a message is sent.
creator: sfhowes

content: In Table View, right-click any column button and enable the Location column, and the Account column for a Unified folder.
creator: sfhowes

content: Are cookies accepted in TB Settings/Privacy & Security? If they aren't, the address isn't entered automatically in the OAuth window, and authentication won't complete, even if the address is entered manually.
creator: sfhowes

content: I knew it must be something stupid simple like that. Thank you so much for your help.

content: If you have the correct settings (smtp.mail.yahoo.com, port 465, SSL/TLS, OAuth2 authentication, User Name = email address), try with Windows running in safe mode, to test for interference by antivirus (especially if it's not Windows Security).
creator: sfhowes

content:
There are many possible sources of slow performance. It will take some troubleshooting to narrow the cause(s). I suggest you work through these steps:

https://wiki.mozilla.org/Thunderbird:Testing:Memory_Usage_Problems

You could also test with a new profile and one gmail IMAP account, in case you simply have a profile with too many hidden flaws. Help/Troubleshooting, about:profiles, to create and manage profiles. The current profile is unaffected.
creator: sfhowes

I will come back here and report again probably tomorrow or the next day. I appreciate your help.
